title: Elegant Duplex Retreat in Krosno Old Town with Contemporary Luxury
description: Introducing a distinguished duplex featuring five spacious bedrooms and two elegantly appointed bathrooms, spread across 215 square meters of inspiring living space. The property boasts an open floor plan with meticulously crafted interiors, complemented by underfloor heating and a state-of-the-art video intercom system. Two private balconies offer peaceful spots for morning coffee or evening relaxation, and select residents enjoy access to a shared swimming pool, ideal for unwinding. Attention to winter comfort is ensured with a premium heated driveway.
neighborhood_description: Set in the charming Old Town neighborhood of Krosno, this property offers serene surroundings and a pet-friendly ethos. Here, residents revel in the quiet atmosphere, tree-lined avenues, and the welcoming sense of community characteristic of low-density living. With direct access to major highways, this address blends tranquil privacy with convenient connectivity for quick getaways or daily commuting.
lifestyle_benefits: year-round comfort with climate control technology
target_buyer: Perfectly suited for dynamic young couples or families seeking standout style, modern amenities, and a peaceful Berkeley of the city's historical heart.
market_positioning: This luxurious duplex is distinct in its offering: sumptuously equipped and positioned within Krosno's captivating Old Town, it presents an exclusive opportunity in a usually historic and understated part of town. Luxury real estate options with such a coherent blend of modern design and tranquil neighborhood setting seldom come to market, underscoring its unique appeal for high-end buyers.
